text: Asavdy () is a rural locality (a village) in Kalmiyarovsky Selsoviet, Tatyshlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 110 as of 2010. There are 2 streets. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Verkhniye Tatyshly, 10 km from Starokalmiyarovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tatyshlinsky District
title: Asavdy
